description:
This JCR Package provides the Admin UI for Peregrine CMS
        but also installs the Admin Bundle.

com.peregrine.admin.replication.impl.Loc.name: local
com.peregrine.admin.replication.impl.Loc.description: Replication Service that copies the resources to another folder within the same Peregrine CMS instance

com.peregrine.admin.replication.impl.Dis.name: remote
com.peregrine.admin.replication.impl.Dis.description: Replication Service that is replication to another Peregrine CMS Server using Sling's Forward Distribution

com.peregrine.admin.replication.impl.Loc.name: localFS
com.peregrine.admin.replication.impl.Loc.description: Replication Service that is replicating the resources to a File / Folder on the local machine by rendering it using Sling

com.peregrine.admin.replication.DefaultR.name: defaultRepl
com.peregrine.admin.replication.DefaultR.description: Replication Service that is replicating resources based on its path by one or more predefined Replication Services
